column4: Hi, I have a WD MyBook or MY Essential whatever 500 gb external HD, but the file system only recognizes 160 GB of capacity out of 500.. but disk utility sees the whole thing as does lsusb
how did you format the drive?  did you try using fat from linux?
465.8 is a 500G drive see following link for an explanation http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hard_disk_drive#Capacity_measurements
